summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to J Epstein & Co Inc, detailing transportation charges for various shipments made in July 2000. It includes multiple entries for services rendered, including charges for special handling and fuel surcharges, along with the addresses associated with the shipments.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated July 24, 2000, and pertains to various FedEx shipments made by J Epstein & Co Inc.
Multiple individuals are mentioned as senders and recipients of packages associated with J Epstein & Co Inc.
The total charges for the services rendered amount to $174.78.
The document includes details about fuel surcharges applied to the transportation charges.
There are several entries for package pickups and deliveries throughout July 2000.
